func:
msg.originalVolume = msg.payload

new_based_on_percentage = Math.floor(msg.payload * 1.3)
new_based_on_minimum = msg.payload + 10

msg.payload = Math.max(new_based_on_percentage, new_based_on_minimum)
return msg

func:
current_volume = msg.payload

desired_volume = msg.desired_volume

if (current_volume < desired_volume) {
    current_volume++
    msg.payload = current_volume
    node.send(msg)
}
